section.p: An injection into the epidural space of the spine. Source: The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] method with data type Code
Contains a code corresponding to the method of administration of the anesthetic agent.Suggested like values: B:BOLUS, I:INTERMITTENT, D:DRIP INFUSION, etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] puncture, where its type is Epidural Administration Event
To pierce with a pointed object, as with a needle.

Contains exactly one [1..1] method with data type Code
Contains a code corresponding to the method of administration of the anesthetic agent.Suggested like values: B:BOLUS, I:INTERMITTENT, D:DRIP INFUSION, etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] puncture, where its type is Epidural Administration Event
To pierce with a pointed object, as with a needle.
